detaileddescription.para: Convert the binary (bit vector) format of a search state to an array of piece counts. This array has a zero element after the last valid character.

memberdef.argsstring: (register STATE *state, register int index, int num_joints)
memberdef.name: insert_new_chunk

detaileddescription.para: Create a memory space for a new state variable. Set its initial value according to the parameters.
Return the number of ones that are in this state.
Print out the current state variable on a line with a label.
Set the first n bits in a state.
